attributes.action: ensure that all English Premiership and League Football fixtures are played in the home country of the "home" club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To protest at the possible franchising of Premiership fixtures overseas and ensure even more fans aren't priced out of watching our national sport or their favourite clubs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
